item.title: French Series ‘Vendetta’ Aims to Break Corsican Gangster Cliché
item.description: Ange Basterga’s “Vendetta” offers an uncompromising look at the violence of organized crime in Corsica and its impact on a man trying to break free from the cycle of vengeance that has plagued his fam
